Parameter.Label: Dim Start Level
Parameter.Help: A dimmer receiving this command will start dimming from that start level if this bit is set to 0. If the bit is set to 1, the dimmer will ignore the start level and instead start dimming from its current level.

Parameter.Label: LED Indication
Parameter.Help: The WD500Z-1 will flicker its LED when it is transmitting to any of its groups. This can be changed if desired.

Parameter.Label: Invert Switch
Parameter.Help: To change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom to ON change parameter to 1.

Parameter.Label: Enable Shade Control Group 2
Parameter.Help: The switch can control shade control devices if this parameter is set to 1

Parameter.Label: Enable Shade Control Group 3
Parameter.Help: The switch can control shade control devices if this parameter is set to 1.

Parameter.Label: LED Transmission Indication
Parameter.Help: The WD500Z-1 will flicker its LED when it is transmitting to any of its groups. Parameter set to 0 = not flicker Parameter set to 1 = flicker the entire time of transmitting Parameter set to 2 = flicker for only 1 second.

Group.Label: Double Tap
Group.Help: Turn devices on an off by tapping the top or the bottom of the switch twice. Brighten or dim devices by tapping and then hold the top or the bottom of the switch.

Group.Label: Triple Tap
Group.Help: Turn devices on an off by tapping the top or the bottom of the switch three times. Brighten or dim devices by tapping twice and then hold the top or the bottom of the switch.
